name: Cibus Arcade
description:
YOU ARE A FISH
YOU NEED FOOD
YOU NEED REST
REACH THE BREEDING GROUNDS

Only with you and your growing Plant, you must venture forward to the breeding grounds and finally breathe new life into the world.

(Controls are in game, too)
Arrow Keys - Movement
Shift - Speed boost
Z - Bite
Space - Staying silent while surviving the night

This was made from December 10th to December 20th for the Dredge the Deep Dread XP game jam.
